examples.text: the Supreme Commander of the armed forces
It is an event in which she **reigns supreme**.

definitions.definition: very great or the greatest in degree

examples.text: to make the **supreme sacrifice** *(= die for what you believe in)*

wordOrigin: late 15th cent. (in the sense ‘highest’): from Latin supremus, superlative of superus ‘that is above’, from super ‘above’.
